column6: Flavor Text
Bill is fond of mentioning Kiva in many of his speaches, frequently sending a swarm of new lenders to the site.
There is a strong office tradition of kareyoke at kiva, often centered around the San Francisco staple "the mint"

column3: Immediately buy 3 idea cards for free

column6: the "Rino Ninjas" are one of the fearcest after work trampoline dodgeball teams your will ever meet

column3: Immediately buy, and play one idea card for free
column6: Periodically kiva gives its engeneers two weeks to work on whatever they feel needs doing in the company, often with amazing results.
this department is devoted to discovering where loans will have the most impact, leadint to our "social performance badges"
One nice thing about trying to help others, is often others try to help you!
Founder and C.E.O. Matt keeps a philosphical outlook, and stears kiva carefuly
Kiva's president, premal is a motivated and talented leader. He has also been known to do "the worm" at parties
When facing a locked office door with no key in sight, kiva's rock-climbing employees were ready at a moments notice.
Each year, kiva employees forgo their razors for a month, to participate in the "mustaches for children" fundraiser, helping to buy much needed school supplies
Kiva's single largest event was it's appearance on the Oprah show, causing sudden and unpressidented growth
The largest, and most active lending team on kiva, team athiasts can usually be found at the top of the lending team charts
The strongest contender for most active lending team, the Christian lending team is often neck and neck with the athiest team
unlike most non profits, over three quarters of kiva's operating capital comes from small lender donations.
Human Resources keeps all of our teams well staffed, happy, and educated
These engeners are renowned for their dedication, and excessive overtime keeping the our internal software behaving.
zip.kiva.org is kiva's latest exparament, allowing select borrowers to bipass the Microfinance institutions, and borrow dirrectly.
These saveey lenders have found a way to convert kiva lending into airline miles. In the process they have managed to be come the third most active lending team
Kiva interacts with hundreds of MFIs through a custom built website, maintianed by the tireless engeneers of PA2
The great thing about kiva is that you get your money back to loan again!
This engenering team builds the website that lenders use, the public face of the kiva operation.
The cornerstone of modern software development, unit testing catches bugs before they happen.
The Review & Translation Program is made of hundreds of volenteers who translate each of our loans. After all… that farmer in rural peru probably doesn't know english.
This crack team of engeneers focuses on developing code for special events and promotions
Kiva has several reading and discussion groups, using books to fule new ideas
C&M does an amazing job motivating our lenders to get involved, motivated, and enthused
We have all the accounting issues of a web startup, an international bank, and a non-profit rolled into one.
Like most non-profits some of kiva's funding comes from anonoumous donors
Bob is a news columnist, author and Jeopardy champ who writes about kiva
When it's time for a snack in the office, carrots have your back
Though it's a small department, Donor development helps bring in the capital we need
The Quality Assurance team goes by this name. Many of them are also talented circus perfomers.
When an MFI needs face to face help, these talented folks are the ones who show up on the scene
Helping to keep kiva on the right side of the law, and to navigate the ambiguitys of having a brand new model for a non-profit
Everyone wants to buy a gift card or make a loan for the holidays.
India has some very complicated laws regarding forgien credit, along with a very large population that it can help
Kiva city is a special program, highlighting US cities where kiva is working to help connect lenders and borrowers
Kiva is lucky to have several very generous donors
Kiva works with Micro Finance Institutions all over the world, who find and vet borrowers.
NerdFighters is a popular website with great content, they have also been championing kiva for some time
It turns out that websites need to be hosted on computers, and when servers need wrangling non can do it better than our ops team
With so many loans going to borrowers delbritly selected for need, managing risk through diversification is a must

column3: Look at the next 5 cards in any deck
column6: Kiva's board is constantly pushing to keep the orginzation looking ahead, and focused on what matters most
The interns at kiva are some of the brightest folks to be found anywhere
Kiva fellows are brave and intreped volenters who spend months visiting borrowers, ensuring that lenders money is reaching the people who it's supposed to
When the work day is done, and it's time to kick back with a beer, this gentleman will make sure you know where it's happening
The dark side of snack time, expanding waist lines along with with it's delicious dominance
Lenders loan some of what they have, It turns out some lenders have a LOT
The Kiva office wouldn't be the same without this chearfull dog stealing our socks
The Kiva open house is a chance for donors to see what things are like inside the kiva offices
The alpha dog of the kiva office, Otis keeps all the other puppies in line

column3: Remove one borrower from the game
No New Lenders may be played this turn
add 7 borrowers to the borrower pool
Place one Permanent Asset into your discard pile
Remove two borrower tokens from the game
Each player must discard a "favor" card if possible
Place one Permanent Asset into your discard pile
No more than three lenders may be active at the end of the turn
Each player must discard two cards from their deck
Tap all of each players Permanent Asset cards
Remove one inactive lender token from the game
